post:
We at Temok have extremely good hardware combined with a superior support staff. At Temok you will enjoy the experience. We do our best to provide service that is not simply satisfying but enjoyable. We work beyond your expectation and go the extra mile to fulfill your demands. Our Virtual Private Servers are setup on very powerful main nodes with top-quality connectivity to ensure that each VPS delivers best possible effectiveness and offers the flexibility to run large websites and install third party applications quite easily. In terms of VPS hosting management is concerned, all VPS Hosting plans are fully managed*. VPS hosting management includes setup, software installation, security monitoring and 24/7 Technical Support which helps clients concentrate more on the progression of their business.

We provide the following features for all of our VPS Hosting packages.

» 24/7 Technical Support
» Fully Managed Servers
» Lifetime Hardware Guarantee
» 99.9% Network Uptime
» Powerful Intel Processors
» Full Root SSH Access
» 24h or less Setup time
» Free Weekly Backup
» XEN Virtualization
» Free OS reinstall
» Free Reboots

We provide different packages to match everyone's needs and budget.

About Us:

Temok has been providing quality Hosting services since 2014. Our Aim at Temok is to always give prime quality fully managed web hosting services at the best rate along with the highest possible client pleasure.
